entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow changing to ice pellets then changing to rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
